description: Triangular numbers with the every digit a triangular number.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,200
example: a(6) = 36 is a triangular number, 3 and 6 are also triangular numbers.
prog: (PARI) TD(x)= { return(x==0 || x==1 || x==3 || x==6) } { n=t=0; for (m=0, 10^9, t+=m; x=t; td=1; while (x>9, d=x-10*(x\10); if (!TD(d), td=0; break); x\=10); if (td && TD(x), write("b062100.txt", n++, " ", t); if (n==200, break)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 01 2009]
